text: Ronald Heard (December 21, 1948 â€“ March 7, 2017) was a former American professional wrestler. He was best known under the name "The Outlaw" Ron Bass. His gimmick was a Texan cowboy who entered World Wrestling Federation (WWF) rings to the sound of a bullwhip. In March 2017, Bass was hospitalized in Tampa, Florida due to a burst appendix and underwent surgery. He died on March 7, 2017 from complications of appendicitis-related surgery at the age of 68. After his death, an autopsy revealed that Heard had been suffering from chronic traumatic encephalopathy (CTE). ==References== Category:1948 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Deaths from appendicitis Category:Deaths from surgical complications Category:American wrestlers Category:Former WWE wrestlers Category:Sportspeople from Arkansas Category:Sportspeople from Texas
title: Ron Bass (wrestler)
